title: The woman a precious pearl
name: The woman a precious pearl
description:
Comment Count: 4 | Unique Commenters: 3 | Engagement: 1 | Likes and Votes: 0 | Inbound Links: 0 | Sentiment: Neutral 

Who is writing it: Muhammad Aïssa Ali Jinnah – young writer
Country: France
What are they writing about mostly (under the child marriage topic): 
Doesn’t necessarily talk about child marriage, but presents the woman in Islam, how well treated and respected in the teaching of the religion
Why is it of particular interest: It presents the counter view from the first blog (child marriage in Islam) – the author is also the writer of a series of blogs (8 in total) discussing the marriage of the prophet Muhammad with 9 year old Aicha (below)
Anything in particular drawing your attention: A brief history into how women were treated before Islam and why Islam helped regulate and respect women’s rights
Whom it is supported/endorsed by: University Graduate in France (Université de Nîmes
Class of 2008) with a profile on Facebook: 361 followers- http://fr-fr.facebook.com/people/Muhammad-Aissa-Ali-Jinnah/100001547210964
